title: Attempting to reconnect (DDOS) LAG
body: Riot, today 10/13/16, my connection is fine constant 35 ms, but for some reason every like 30 seconds or so I get an Attempting to recconect for 5-10 seconds, Ive tried restarting my connection computer switching accounts all, I saw Imaqtpie have the same problem in his last game before watching C9 vs SSG I think its happening only to a few people, but it's something I'd appreciate if you looked at it - Thanks!

replies.body: I solved the issue sorry if I bothered anyone, apparently my ISP had a problem and it affected the region where I live, thanks for anyone trying to solve the problem!

This situation often occurs if there are problems along your route to the servers. Since problematic local network settings are the most frequent cause for this, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to spot check your settings.

Let me know if you continue to experience this issue after taking those steps.
Just installed windows 10 and deleted every single thing I had on my drive, still have the same issue... :(((((
Still having the issue... :( Can't play league at least not competitively

Thanks for answering so quickly :), I wen't through every single point changed everything it asked me and it hasn't fixed it, ( I want to point out I have been playing this game for ages and never had this problem it just happened today and it's been up for the last 6 hours, let me know if there is anything I can do if you want me to upload a video of the problem I'd gladly do it just let me know how to do it! XD don't have any recording programs and don't know how to upload it
